Born to Relieve Lumbar Pressure From Long Time Stting

ã€Why Choose HOINIO Chairã€‘Sitting position without support to the lumbar spine creates nearly 50% increase in IVDï¼ˆIntervertebral Lumbar Disc) pressure compared to sitting with lumbar support.The HOINIO chair is the only ergonomic chair that provides adaptive lumbar support for all sitting postures.

ã€American Ergonomist Endorsementã€‘IRIS SOKOL, Founder of Ergowell, LLC,â€œThe Newtral lifts your spine and helps provide you decompression of your lumbar discs. The lumbar function in the Newtral chair is one of the most unique lumbar supports I have seen.â€

ã€Unique Adaptive Lumbar Supportã€‘HOINIO Office Chair with Lumbar Support has an auto chasing mechanism (first in the world for chairs), which automatically follows the movement of the lower back, providing strong lumbar support throughout the day. The intensity of the lumbar support can be adjusted to meet individual needs, it fits the natural curvature of your spine and can help relieves back pain.

ã€Multiple Adjustmentsã€‘The backrest of the HOINIO ergonomic office chair can be reclined and locked into a variety of positions within a range of 96Â°-116Â°. The headrest can adjust in the angle and height providing the most comfortable position for your neck. The seat Seat lifts up and down and moves forward and back , plus 3D adjustable armrests for the ultimate in customized comfort in the office, or for gaming ! Adjustable ergonomic chair is suitable for people about 5'3" to 6'3". Loading Capacity up to 300 lbs.

ã€High -Qualityã€‘The HOINIO home office chair uses the the gas lift is high-quality KGS classe 4 made in Korea, and certified by BIFMA/SGS. Korea Filo Breathable Back Mesh to keep good air circulation in your back, perfect for longtime sitting.7cm high high-density sponge cushion seat for long sitting without collapse. Our office chairs are solid and durable, providing quality assurance for your healthy work and life.

ã€3 Years Warranty & Easy AssemblyÂ ã€‘If our computer chairs have quality problems, please feel free to contact us by email (email address: support@newtral-chair.com), we promise 3-years warranty and replace the damaged product accessories for you free of charge. With clear instruction and tools, the desk chair is easy to assemble (about 15~20 minutes)
